page.description: When you republish the "AlphaSports_Customer_Grid" page, it will automatically republish its modified grid component.

step.description: Click 'save' to preserve your work and close the HTML Editor.
Click Close to return to the Web Projects Control Panel.
Right click "AlphaSports_Customer_Grid" and select Publish (local webroot) and open. You should see something like the following.
Finally, see how the component works. Enter "james" into the Firstname field and click Search.
